reviewtext: As nice as WIFI would be if it worked reliably for everyone, it can be a nightmare for those that are not networking experts. In my experience with WIFI devices, I've spent hours working with customer support trying to get them working. I decided one day that I have lost to many hours of my life trying to avoid those cat5 cables, besides a lot of us already have spaghetti wire messes in our house from all our electronic gagets . With this device (as with others) you just plug in the cables and the power and the rest takes care of it's self.
summary: Plug and Play-Beats WIFI Buggies Any Day
